name: Salad
description: A refreshing salad with mixed greens, vegetables, and a light dressing.

name: Beef Stir Fry
description: Tender strips of beef stir-fried with colorful vegetables in a savory sauce.

name: Vegetable Soup
description: A comforting and nutritious soup made with a variety of fresh vegetables.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: A healthy and flavorful dish featuring grilled salmon fillet seasoned with herbs and lemon.

name: Pasta Carbonara
description: A classic Italian pasta dish with a creamy sauce made from eggs, cheese, and pancetta.
